alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Macomb and southeastern St. Clair Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1129 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Baltimore, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harsens Island around 1145 PM EDT. Algonac and Marine City around 1155 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Anchorville, Pearl Beach, Chesterfield Township, New Haven, Adair and Fair Haven. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
